I recommend getting prime if you dont have it as you will most likely not get any cheaters with prime enabled also Its a very fun game. I was really bad at the game 2 months ago, I had a big break and came back With a friend that I just started playing with 3 days ago and turns out im actually pretty good at the game now
I never knew you could hold a grenade for so long without it exploding!

游戏很好玩，终于不会因为没有火麒麟雷神而自卑。
如果没有陀螺自瞄确实是一个很公平的竞技游戏。
虽然我常常经历1v5残局翻盘————对面是那个1
出中门直接收过路费————我是交钱的那个
不搜点直接被电————我的队友是那个发出“啊~”的那位
говно не играйте плез а то вырежу вашу семейку и кота
not bad and all based on skill
Mano muito legal o jogo amo muito
very fun play if can reccomed
